Comment: Abilities: A0YT (Unleash Frostmourne), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value:
Arthas channels Frostmourne's full power, periodically firing out bolts of necromantic energy at nearby hostile living, friendly undead, and corpse units. Each bolt has a different effect depending on the type of unit struck:
 - Hostile living: Damaged
 - Friendly undead: Healed by half damage amount
 - Corpse: Reanimated for 70 seconds

Fury of the Damned lasts <A0YT,DataA1> seconds. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 100 damage per bolt. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 140 damage per bolt. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 180 damage per bolt.
